channel.title: 317 PI - Client Crashes after clicking on Guthix Altar
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to make a server using a 317 Project Insanity source, but I keep running into this problem. I have tried multiple sources and multiple clients, but it seems all of them have the same issue. So as the title says, every time I click on the Guthix Altar (Or when I click the magic book afterwards / upon login), my client crashes and gives me this error:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/njbP3Rk.png[/img]
If anyone has a fix, that'd be great. I am fairly new to troubleshooting errors and whatnot, so go easy on me.
